import { Component, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], }) export class HomeComponent { @HostListener('window:scroll', []) onWindowScroll() { const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.section'); sections.forEach((section) => { const sectionTop = section.getBoundingClientRect().top; const windowHeight = window.innerHeight; // If the section is in view, add the 'visible' class if (sectionTop < windowHeight - 100) { section.classList.add('visible'); } }); } }
